prod_short_desc: Stay fit and healthy at the Heartlake Sports Center!
prod_long_desc:
Get active at the LEGO® Friends Heartlake Sports Center. Inside the sliding entrance door there are lockers, a gym with a punch bag and gymnastic rings, juice bar, rolling treadmill and a yoga studio with an exercise bar, weights and a yoga mat. Outside there’s a bike rack, soccer goal and basketball game with shooting function. Includes two mini-doll figures.
Build your own Sports Center, complete with gym with punching bag and rings, lockers that open, treadmill, juice bar, basketball game with shooting function and much more
Includes Mia and Robert mini-doll figures
Sports Center measures over 4” high, 9” wide and 5” long
LEGO Friends toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Combine with 41313 Heartlake Summer Pool for even more warm weather fun
328 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years old
